physical_appearance:This is a black-and-white photograph of a navy soldier. He is standing with his arms held in front of him. He is wearing a white navy headgear
 with short sleeved top
 short pants
 long socks and shoes. He is standing in front of a house
 with a tall bush behind him on the right of the photograph. The edges of the photograph are uneven.

sgcool_label_text:A variety of portraits of British soldiers that show them at leisure as well as two photographs of James Steele placing a wreath at a remembrance ceremony
 this collection is part of the archive of James Steele
 Royal Artillery (Field) who served in Malaya from January 1941-February 1942
 when interned as a P.O.W at Changi until his release in October 1945.

metadata.title_text: Group of 50 photographs of P.O.W James Steele and regiment when stationed in Malaysia in 1941 (and 2 later photographs of Steele placing a wreath at ceremony of remembrance)  E. W.  Harris S.P.O, H.M.S. Emerald
metadata.physical_appearance: This is a black-and-white photograph of a navy soldier. He is standing with his arms held in front of him. He is wearing a white navy headgear, with short sleeved top, short pants, long socks and shoes. He is standing in front of a house, with a tall bush behind him on the right of the photograph. The edges of the photograph are uneven.
metadata.context_7: Great Britain. Army. Royal Field Artillery
metadata.sgcool_label_text: A variety of portraits of British soldiers that show them at leisure as well as two photographs of James Steele placing a wreath at a remembrance ceremony, this collection is part of the archive of James Steele, Royal Artillery (Field) who served in Malaya from January 1941-February 1942, when interned as a P.O.W at Changi until his release in October 1945.
